__e: You're still a little pale though, but you get out in the sunshine in this lovely weather.
Michael, I don't know what you saw in your machine, but I remember, a few weeks ago, you came back from your lab, pale.
I don't know, it's probably the light, but you did seem to have a strange pallor.
No wonder you're so pale and white.
But he looks so white and... and... and heavy.
I'd say it's like looking in a mirror, but you're so pale and weak.
